mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.category_id, p.brand, p.weight, p.count, p.product_price, p.update_date, p.cell_count, p.stock, c.category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.category_id < 7 ORDER BY p.product_id DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.category_id, p.brand, p.weight, p.count, p.product_price, p.update_date, p.cell_count, p.stock, c.category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY p.product_id DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.category_id, p.brand, p.weight, p.count, p.product_price, p.update_date, p.cell_count, p.stock, c.category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
